quoteText: With respect to pictures and streaming live and pre-recorded audio-visual works, the rights granted by you terminate once you delete such UGC from Likee Services, or generally by deregistering your account, except (a) we used it for promotional purposes. and (b) for the reasonable time it takes to remove from backup and other systems.
title: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account

tosdr.case: This service retains rights to your content even after you stop using your account
